Set Value Commands.setfood: To set the food item you want to order

Web Commands.process: To load the required data from food delivery website
Web Commands.result: To show the required result from Food Delivery Website

Basic Commands.clear: To clear the values set in database
Basic Commands.list: To show the currently set values in database

Miscellaneous Commands.trending: To show the trending food items in your city
Miscellaneous Commands.blogs: To show the blogs related to food
